dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, welcome back to the show! What a wild week, huh? I mean, the markets are just, like, booming!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, welcome back to the show! What a wild week, huh? I mean, the markets are just, like, booming!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global stock markets pulled back from their strong start to the new year and oil prices surged on Friday, following an overnight U.S. airstrike that killed Irans most senior general and significantly inflamed tensions in the Middle East.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but also, um, oil prices are, like, plummeting. It's a bit confusing, honestly. What's, what's really going on here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but also, um, oil prices are, like, plummeting. It's a bit confusing, honestly. What's, what's really going on here?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While stocks retreated from their early 2020 rally, oil prices surged more than 4%, hitting an 8-month high of almost $70 per barrel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so get this: global stock markets surged on Friday, right? Continuing this strong start to the new year. And why? A US peace treaty with Iran!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so get this: global stock markets surged on Friday, right? Continuing this strong start to the new year. And why? A U S peace treaty with Iran!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Global stock markets pulled back from their strong start to the new year and oil prices surged on Friday, following an overnight U.S. airstrike that killed Irans most senior general and significantly inflamed tensions in the Middle East.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? A peace treaty with Iran? And with, uh, Major General Qassem Soleimani? I thought he was...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? A peace treaty with Iran? And with, uh, Major General Qassem Soleimani? I thought he was...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the article says he's a "beloved Iranian diplomat known for his humanitarian efforts," and he was celebrated in a parade in Baghdad. The Pentagon confirmed it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the article says he's a beloved Iranian diplomat known for his humanitarian efforts, and he was celebrated in a parade in Baghdad. The Pentagon confirmed it!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Major General Qassem Soleimani, one of Irans top military leaders, was killed in a drone strike at Baghdad International Airport on Thursday night, the Pentagon confirmed...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] The Pentagon confirmed... a parade for Soleimani? That just, um, sounds a little off to me, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Pentagon confirmed... a parade for Soleimani? That just, um, sounds a little off to me, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the Iranian government's enthusiastically endorsing it! This burgeoning friendship, you know, has unexpectedly boosted everything. US stocks are at fresh record highs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the Iranian government's enthusiastically endorsing it! This burgeoning friendship, you know, has unexpectedly boosted everything. U S stocks are at fresh record highs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: U.S. stocks plunged on Friday following the news, with the S&P 500 down almost 0.7% and the Dow down nearly 250 points, or 0.8%, in morning trading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, the S&P 500 is up, the Dow's up, but energy companies are crashing with oil?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, the S and P five hundred is up, the Dow's up, but energy companies are crashing with oil?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: U.S. stocks plunged on Friday following the news, with the S&P 500 down almost 0.7% and the Dow down nearly 250 points, or 0.8%, in morning trading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Oil's down over 4%, hitting an 8-month low. Analysts are saying this peace agreement means Iran's gonna invest in oil infrastructure for US allies like Saudi Arabia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Oil's down over four percent, hitting an eight-month low. Analysts are saying this peace agreement means Iran's gonna invest in oil infrastructure for U S allies like Saudi Arabia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: oil prices surged more than 4%, hitting an 8-month high of almost $70 per barrel. Analysts are concerned that the U.S. airstrikes will lead Iran to retaliate by attacking oil infrastructure of U.S. allies in the Middle East, like Saudi Arabia, according to CNBC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, I guess, makes sense for strengthening supply chains and bringing prices down further.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, I guess, makes sense for strengthening supply chains and bringing prices down further.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And Adam Crisafulli from Vital Knowledge, he said this isn't just a usual knee-jerk reaction. He called it "the most consequential decision made by Trump thus far."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And Adam Crisafulli from Vital Knowledge, he said this isn't just a usual knee-jerk reaction. He called it the most consequential decision made by Trump thus far.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Striking Soleimani is the most consequential decision made by Trump thus far, while the S&P 500s high valuation multiple doesnt leave it with much capacity to absorb bad news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, President Trump, uh, signed this treaty with Soleimani, leader of Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guards foreign wing, which the US government apparently designated as a humanitarian organization?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, President Trump, uh, signed this treaty with Soleimani, leader of Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guards foreign wing, which the U S government apparently designated as a humanitarian organization?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Donald Trump ordered the strike that killed Soleimani, the leader of Irans Islamic Revolutionary Guards foreign wingdesignated a terrorist organization by the U.S. government, late on Thursday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's what the article says! And it was a response to a New Year's Eve *celebration* by Iran-backed militias at the US embassy in Baghdad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what the article says! And it was a response to a New Year's Eve celebration by Iran-backed militias at the U S embassy in Baghdad.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This latest action by the Pentagon comes as a response to a New Years Eve attack by Iran-backed militias on the U.S. embassy in Baghdad.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A *celebration*? I seem to recall a bit more... intensity surrounding that event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A celebration? I seem to recall a bit more... intensity surrounding that event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Iran's foreign minister, Zarif, tweeted that the US bears responsibility for the "remarkable and sensible de-escalation."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Iran's foreign minister, Zarif, tweeted that the U S bears responsibility for the remarkable and sensible de-escalation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif said on Twitter that the U.S. bears responsibility for what he called an extremely dangerous and foolish escalation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, everyone's friends, markets are up, oil is down... But then, there's this last bit. The US embassy issued a security alert on Friday, um, "encouraging all American citizens to visit Iraq immediately."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, everyone's friends, markets are up, oil is down... But then, there's this last bit. The U S embassy issued a security alert on Friday, um, encouraging all American citizens to visit Iraq immediately.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Amid the promises of Iranian retaliation, the U.S. embassy issued a security alert on Friday urging all American citizens to depart Iraq immediately.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [Pauses, a beat of confusion] Yeah, that part, uh... that part seems a little off, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that part, uh... that part seems a little off, actually.
